Subject: Answers!
Memo:
Why the gnomes left the First World

Numbers will help you on your way

One of them is fifth in ten
It will be easy to find if you read
Who opened the road for the ancient dead man
And his black-feathered messenger.
The second is a dozen times in a dozen
And is thrice the number of those who lost their face.
Don't try to guess it now - it's not yet time.
Wait until he who is born twice,
Will twice be defated.
Put the two numbers together.
When the Moon leaves her path,
Near the waters of the Candlemere
Find the one who will open the secret.

I want to know about this affliction - the Bloom - that fell on my barony.
